name: Tower Stack (itch) (xlibraires)
description:
In search of stacking & building skyscraper games?

Do you want the classic tower builder tower stack game-play while creating your own city.

Welcome to Tower Stack 🏢 Block Builder 🏗 . Show your construction skills to create a stable tower stack. In this tower building arcade game, you can create sky high towers if you show calmness, momentum, and good reflexes.

SIMPLE CONTROLS🎮

The crane is moving the square floor. Tap in the right moment to stack the square tower blocks on each other. Putting it precisely on top of one another is the ultimate goal and it will help you build the tallest buildings and complete levels.

If you stack consecutively three tower blocks precisely you will gain magnetic power-ups which helps in beating your high-score.

Also you can demolish a block by using block cash💰 if you feel you can put that block in better.

The more you stack you will earn block cash through which you can buy power-ups and different tower models.

⭐️GET TOWER Stack NOW!

- Classic tower building game-play

- Stack cubes precisely for highest scores

- Build your own city

- Simple tap controls

- Amazing Tower options to choose from

Now it’s time to build skyscrapers and create your own city.

Experience a thrilling satisfaction when stacking each tower building blocks on one another. It feels so satisfying.

🕹Play Tower Stack🏢 – Tower Stacker 🏗 NOW – FOR FREE!
